question: Which one is NOT the receptor for innate recognition?
explanation:
TNF-α receptor 屬於細胞介素受體，不具有先天免疫辨識的功能。
［出自考古第1題］

question: What kind of disease can probably be controlled by vaccine?
explanation:
圖中列出的可能疫苗應用，除了感染性疾病外，尚包含癌症、神經退行性疾病、藥物成癮和自體免疫疾病，選項皆在範圍內。
【出處】超出範圍
［出自考古第2題］

question: Which one is NOT the event during inflammation?
explanation:
發炎反應會造成微血管擴張，以增加血流量。
(A) 發炎時，血管直徑應為「增加」。
［出自考古第3題］

question: 補體系統 (complement) 中最關鍵的過程是 C3 的分解產生 C3b，然後有三種先天性免疫反應會發生，請簡述這三種反應的作用過程。
explanation:
(A) 局部發炎反應 (local inflammatory response)：C3a 和 C5a 會誘發局部發炎反應，作用到周圍血管上使血流量增加、血管通透性增加、多表現細胞黏附分子、增加吞噬細胞與內皮的結合，以召集並活化巨噬細胞、多型核白血球 (PMNs) 和淋巴球；血管通透性增加也會增加抗體和補體分子的外滲；肥大細胞釋出組織胺和 TNF-α 以促進發炎反應。
(B) 調理作用 (opsonization)：C3b 會結合到微生物表面。具有補體接受器 (CRs, complement receptors) 的吞噬細胞 (phagocytes) 與微生物表面上的補體分子結合，促進吞噬細胞進行吞噬作用。
(C) 膜攻擊複合體 (membrane-attack complex)：C3b 和 C3 convertase 結合形成 C5 convertase，將 C5 切成 C5a 與 C5b。C5b 和 C6, C7, C8, C9n 組合為插入膜上的 membrane-attack complex (MAC)，C9 聚合出穿膜的通道，破壞細胞膜並溶掉細菌或細胞。
［出自考古第1題］

question: 請舉出 4 種屬於免疫治療 (immunotherapy) 的例子。
explanation:
(A) antibody therapy (monoclonal antibodies)
(B) chimeric antigen receptor T-cell therapy (CAR-T cell therapy).
(C) cancer vaccine.
(D) anti-inflammatory and immunosuppressive drugs.
［出自考古第2題］

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation:
此突變小鼠細胞不表現 MHCI，僅表現 MHC II，所以在 Positive selection 的過程中只有可辨識 (self)peptide:self MHC class II complexes 的 Double-positive thymocytes 可以存活，並發育為 CD4 T cells。
［出自考古第1題］

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice with MHC class I transgene expressed in thymic epithelium.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation:
雖此突變小鼠細胞原本不表現 MHC class I，但 Thymic epithelium 有 MHC class I 的 Transgene (透過基因工程手段移至生物體內的外源性基因) 表現，故 Thymic cortical epithelial cell 依然可以表現 MHC class I 以進行 Positive selection。再加上 MHC class II 基因依然正常表現，因此 CD4 和 CD8 T cell 都會成熟。
［出自考古第2題］

question: Thymic cortical epithelial cells mediate positive selection of developing thymocytes. Which cells will mature in the thymus of mouse? MHC class I-negative mutant mice with MHC class I transgene expressed that cannot interact with CD8.

options.C: Both CD4 and CD8 T cells.
options.D: Neither CD4 nor CD8 T cells.

explanation:
若要使 CD8 T cell 發育，則 MHC class I 必須和 CD8 分子有效的作用 (interact)。雖然 Thymic cortical epithelial cell 可以表現 MHC class I，但無法作用的情形下亦無法使 CD8 T cell 發育。
［出自考古第3題］

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Multiple myeloma.
explanation:
多發性骨髓瘤 (multiple myeloma) 為漿細胞 (plasma cell) 增生的惡性疾病，屬於 B 細胞腫瘤。
［出自考古第4題］

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).
explanation:
一般所說的 CLL 為 B cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia (B-CLL)，也有 T cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia，成因為周圍淋巴器官的 T 細胞和 B 細胞異常增生。
［出自考古第5題］

question: Which one of the following tumors is involved in? Thymoma.
explanation:
胸腺瘤 (thymoma) 為胸腺基質/上皮細胞的異常增生，這兩種細胞雖與 T 細胞發育有關，但不屬於 T 細胞，故不屬於 T 或 B 細胞腫瘤。
［出自考古第6題］

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? Adenosine deaminase.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation:
Adenosine deaminase (ADA) 可以移除 DNA 降解時所產生的 Deoxyadenosine。ADA Deficiency 會造成 dATP 累積，將抑制核糖核酸還原酶的活性，進而阻礙 DNA 合成，對於淋巴細胞有高度毒性。因此，缺乏 ADA 會影響 T 細胞和 B 細胞的發育。
［出自考古第7題］

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? IFN-γ deficiency.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation:
IFN-γ 理論上只會影響 B 細胞分泌的抗體類型，而不會影響 B 細胞發育；IFN-γ 主要是影響 $T_{H}1$ 的分化和功能，而不影響 T 細胞發育，因為 T 細胞發育和分化是不一樣的。
［出自考古第8題］

question: Which one of the following defects impairs? RAG deficiency.

options.C: Both B and T cell development.
options.D: Neither B nor T cell development.

explanation:
RAG-1 和 RAG-2 主要負責 T 細胞及 B 細胞的基因重組，故缺乏 RAG 會影響兩者的發育。
［出自考古第9題］

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Polyclonal B-cell activation.
explanation:
TI-1 antigen 在高濃度下會刺激形成 Polyclonol activation。
［出自考古第10題］

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Requires repeating epitopes.
explanation:
TI-2 antigen 這類抗原的特色是有重複的片段，如 Polysaccharide capsule (莢膜類細菌的多醣)，而 B 細胞 (B-1 細胞或是 Marginal zone B cell) 可以辨識並產生 IgM，如果樹突細胞介入，其會分泌 BAFF 使 B 細胞進行 Class switch 產生 IgG。
［出自考古第11題］

question: Which one of the following is the property or example of (A) TD antigen (B) TI-1 antigen (C) TI-2 antigen (D) None? Diphtheria toxin.
explanation:
白喉毒素 (diphetheria toxin) 為 TD，見下圖舉例。
［出自考古第12題］

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Sensitization of mast cells.
explanation:
Mast cells 利用 FcεRI receptor 與 IgE 結合，致敏化後可以進行後續的過敏反應 (allergy; type I hypersensitivity)
［出自考古第13題］

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Sensitization for killing by NK cells.
explanation:
NK cell 利用 FcyRIII receptor (CD16) 和 IgG 結合，可以啟動 ADCC (antibody- dependent cell-mediated cytotoxicity) 反應殺掉細胞。
［出自考古第14題］

question: Which one of the following functions is mainly mediated by human immunoglobulin? Neutralization in the gut lumen.
explanation:
雖然 IgM、IgG 和 IgA 皆有中和作用，但上皮組織屬於 Mucosal immune system，在腸道主要由 IgA-switched plasma cell 分泌 Dimeric IgA，並藉由 Polymeric Ig receptor (pIgR) 將 Lamina propria 的 Plasma cells 分泌的 IgA 從上皮細胞的 Basolateral face 轉運到 Apical face 並釋放到 Gut lumen 中 (腸道腔內本身不會有常駐的淋巴球，抗體是由上皮細胞基底膜後方穿過上皮細胞送到腸道腔中)。
［出自考古第15題］

question: MHC (major histocompatibility complex) is essential for mediating T cell immune response. Below figures are cartoon structure of MHC Class I and Class II. (a or b) is MHC Class I; (a or b) is MHC Class II.
explanation:
(a) 為 MHC Class I；(b) 為 MHC Class II。
［出自考古第1題］

question: MHC (major histocompatibility complex) is essential for mediating T cell immune response. Below figures are cartoon structure of MHC Class I and Class II. According to structural analysis, (class I or class II) has a shallow and closed end of peptide-binding cleft so as to present an antigen peptide of 8-10 ammo acids.
explanation:
MHC class I 的 Peptide-binding cleft 兩端較封閉，只能呈現固定長度的 Peptide (Peptide 中間向外突出)；MHC class II 的 Cleft 兩端開放，抗原可延伸過整個 Binding cleft 並穿出 MHC 兩端外，故可以呈現長度不一的 peptide。
［出自考古第2題］

question: MHC (major histocompatibility complex) is essential for mediating T cell immune response. Below figures are cartoon structure of MHC Class I and Class II. All somatic tissue except for ______ express MHC Class I.
explanation:
MHCI 表現於幾乎所有有核細胞，但是紅血球無核，故不表現 MHCI。
Red blood cells (erythrocytes)
［出自考古第3題］

question: MHC (major histocompatibility complex) is essential for mediating T cell immune response. Below figures are cartoon structure of MHC Class I and Class II. List three types of cells that express MHC Class II.(請寫英文)
explanation:
會表現 MHC Class II 的細胞有：
Dendritic cells, macrophages, B cells, epithelial cell of thymus.
［出自考古第4題］

question: Lymphocyte entry of lymphoid nodes Naive T cells enter lymph nodes through blood circulation. The process is mainly controlled by the interaction of _(on naive T cells) and CD34 on the endothelium.
explanation:
Naive T cell 上的 L-selectin 會和 HEV 上的 GlyCAM-1 和 CD34 結合，產生滾動。
［出自考古第1題］

question: Lymphocyte entry of lymphoid nodes The specialized blood vessel that expresses particular adhesion molecules to control the entry of naïve T cells to lymph nodes is called ______.
explanation:
HEV (high endothelial venule) 為特化的血管，可以調控 naive T cell 進入 lymph node。
［出自考古第2題］

question: T cell activation CD4+ T cell activation requires 2 signals. Signal 1 is given by ______ and Signal 2 is mediated by ______ to enhance IL-2 production from T cells.
explanation:
第一訊號：抗原呈現細胞利用 MHC II-peptide 複合體呈現抗原給 T 細胞的 TCR 和 CD4，產生 TCR-antigen-MHC II 複合體。
第二訊號：抗原呈現細胞上的 B7 會和 T 細胞上的 CD28 結合，維持 IL-2 表現。
［出自考古第1題］

question: T cell activation If naive CD4+ T cells are stimulated with signal 1 without signal 2, the T cells become ______.
explanation:
缺乏第二訊號，T 細胞無法完整活化與分化，變成失能 T 細胞 (anergic)。
［出自考古第2題］

question: T cell differentiation and effector function CD4+ T cells can be differentiated into different cell subsets based on the type of cytokines they produced.
explanation:
CD4+ T cells 會因為細胞激素的不同而分化成不同的 subsets，如圖所示。
［出自考古第1題］

question: T cell differentiation and effector function Each of the differentiated CD4+ T cell subsets (F-J) has different effector functions in the control of microbial infection. helps B cells to produce IgE.
explanation:
$T_{H}2$ 分泌 IL-4 活化肥大細胞、嗜鹼性球，進而促進 IgE 與過敏生成。
［出自考古第2題］

question: T cell differentiation and effector function Each of the differentiated CD4+ T cell subsets (F-J) has different effector functions in the control of microbial infection. helps macrophage activation to eliminate intracellular pathogen.
explanation:
$T_{H}1$ 分泌 IFN-γ 活化 M1 巨噬細胞；誘導單核球 (巨噬細胞前身) 分化；內皮細胞活化 (幫助變形蟲運動)；活化 Naive T 細胞。
［出自考古第3題］

question: T cell differentiation and effector function Each of the differentiated CD4+ T cell subsets (F-J) has different effector functions in the control of microbial infection. helps B cells isotype switching at the germinal center.
explanation:
$T_{FH}$ 分泌 IL-21 促進 B 細胞增殖分化幫助形成 Germinal center 並促進 Class switch 及 Affinity maturation。
［出自考古第4題］

question: T cell differentiation and effector function Each of the differentiated CD4+ T cell subsets (F-J) has different effector functions in the control of microbial infection. enhances neutrophil responses in infected tissues.
explanation:
$T_{H}17$ 分泌 IL-17 促進嗜中性球生成、移動並形成 NETs；分泌 IL-22 促進上皮細胞產生 AMP 進行防禦。
［出自考古第5題］

question: Pick up the correct answer from the list below: mismatched blood transfusion.

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity.
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity.
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity.
options.H: none of the four types of hypersensitivity.

explanation:
Type II hypersensitivity 由 IgG 造成，IgG 會直接接上細胞表面抗原活化補體和吞噬細胞，造成細胞被破壞。例如: 輸血時，身體對血球表面抗原產生過度反應而有溶血性貧血 (hemolytic anemia)。
［出自考古第1題］

question: Pick up the correct answer from the list below: urticaria.

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity.
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity.
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity.
options.H: none of the four types of hypersensitivity.

explanation:
蕁麻疹為 Type I hypersensitivity。
［出自考古第2題］

question: Pick up the correct answer from the list below: contact dermatitis.

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity.
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity.
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity.
options.H: none of the four types of hypersensitivity.

explanation:
Type IV hypersensitivity 不是抗體造成，而是由細胞 (主要是 $T_{H}$ cell) 造成，稱為 Cell-mediated hypersensitivity。以 $T_{H}1$ 為例: 接觸性皮膚炎 (allergic contact dermatitis) 和結核菌素 (tuberculin) reaction。
［出自考古第3題］

question: Pick up the correct answer from the list below: serum sickness (inject animal serum).

options.D: both Type II and Type III hypersensitivity.
options.E: Type I, II and III hypersensitivity.
options.G: all of the Type I, II, III and IV hypersensitivity.
options.H: none of the four types of hypersensitivity.

explanation:
Type III hypersensitivity 由 IgG 造成，針對 Soluble antigen (形成 Immune complex)。例如 Serum sickness (inject animal serum)。
［出自考古第4題］

question: For each of the following select the most appropriate characteristic listed below. The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

options.A: The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

explanation:
G. Snell discovered the first components of the MHC in the 1940s through their role in rejecting transplants in mice. He won the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 1980。
［出自考古第1題］

question: For each of the following select the most appropriate characteristic listed below. Inflammatory bowel disease.

options.A: The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

explanation:
Inflammatory bowel disease 病因是腸道內 $T_{reg}$ 的數量或活性不足，使 Autoreactive T cell 過度活化造成。
［出自考古第2題］

question: For each of the following select the most appropriate characteristic listed below. Myasthenia gravis.

options.A: The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

explanation:
病患體內能找到對抗 ACh (acetylcholine) receptor autoantibody，以及可以辨識乙醯膽鹼受器的 CD4 T cell 來幫助活化 B 細胞產生抗體。
［出自考古第3題］

question: For each of the following select the most appropriate characteristic listed below. Experimental allergic encephalomyelitis (EAE).

options.A: The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

explanation:
透過人工誘發造成自體免疫腦脊髓炎。將正常老鼠的脊髓研磨液 (做為抗原) 加上佐劑打回老鼠體內，可以誘發 Anti-myelin 的 T 細胞產生免疫反應，破壞髓鞘 (myelin) 造成神經受損，造成老鼠癱瘓。
［出自考古第4題］

question: For each of the following select the most appropriate characteristic listed below. Rheumatic fever.

options.A: The scientist who discovered MHC and link it to transplantation rejection and won Nobel prize.

explanation:
原本是要對付入侵人體鏈球菌的抗體，但因心肌細胞上的蛋白和鏈球菌表面抗原類似，因此抗體和心肌細胞以及瓣膜細胞產生了 Cross-reaction, 攻擊心肌，造成心臟發炎，即為風溼熱 (Rheumatic fever)。
［出自考古第5題］

question: What is the most common allergen in patients with allergy?
explanation:
塵蟎 (dust mite)，塵蟎糞便中有 Der P I-IV 及其他抗原，所以涵蓋範圍最大。
［出自考古第1題］

question: The $T_{reg}$ cells have been demonstrated to play important role in regulation inflammation. Which of the following is associated with the development of such T cells in these patients?
explanation:
Foxp3 為 $T_{reg}$ 細胞的 transcription factor。
［出自考古第1題］

question: Which of the following molecules is recently found to be associated with severe drug hypersensitivity reaction, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, to anti-seizure drug carbamazepine?
explanation:
HLA-B 會抓住 CBZ (carbamazepine) 呈現給 T 細胞，促使 T 細胞活化而引起史蒂文生強生症候群 (Stevens-Johnson syndrome)，屬於 Type IV hypersensitivity。
［出自考古第2題］

question: 請簡單舉出五個與自然免疫力有關的組織和細胞。(5分)
explanation:
樹突細胞 (dendritic cell)、巨噬細胞 (macrophage)、嗜中性球 (neutrophil)、嗜酸性球 (eosinophil)、嗜鹼性球 (basophil)、自然殺手細胞 (NK)、先天性淋巴細胞 (ILCs, innate lymphoid cells)、皮膚 (skin)、黏膜 (mucosa)......
(答案不限於以上，五個即可)
［出自考古第1題］
